body: Sorry about the other post but I really need/want a scrim server for my team and I want to use PGM plugs but I don't know how to set up the plugins or maps so I was hoping one of you guys would help me I will provide the log in details in private and you can do it and show me how to do it and add maps etc .Thanks in addition to this I will give you op so you can host scrims on my server thanks Element. The server is online.
